content: That's a great idea. I think I'll try to incorporate some of those mindfulness exercises into my daily commute. It's a great way to make the most of my time and set a positive tone for the day. Speaking of which, I've been trying to be more mindful in my daily activities, especially since I started attending the Buddhist meditation sessions at the Dhamma Center on Tuesdays and Thursdays to improve my mindfulness practice. Do you have any advice on how to stay motivated and consistent with my mindfulness practice, especially when I'm feeling stressed or overwhelmed?
